医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
35 岁后体重增加与乳腺癌风险增加有关体重指数（BMI）长期以来一直被用来衡量身体脂肪，但它对乳腺癌风险的影响比之前想象的更为复杂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Weight-gain-after-35-linked-to-increased-breast-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Weight-gain-after-35-linked-to-increased-breast-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33258f29-53a7-4979-89ad-36e1666234a4 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 11:05:00 -0500 Weight gain after 35 linked to increased breast cancer risk
奥拉帕尼为高风险 BRCA 阳性乳腺癌患者提供生存益处根据 III 期临床试验的最新结果，在标准治疗后接受奥拉帕尼 (Lynparza) 治疗的高风险 BRCA 阳性乳腺癌患者在中位随访 6.1 年后仍比接受安慰剂的患者有更好的生存结果OlympiA 临床试验在 2024 年 12 月 10 日至 13 日举行的圣安东尼奥乳腺癌研讨会 (SABCS) 上发表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Olaparib-provides-survival-benefits-for-high-risk-BRCA-positive-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Olaparib-provides-survival-benefits-for-high-risk-BRCA-positive-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b0e0d58-5e41-486d-9f95-df80d6ce086f Wed, 11 Dec 2024 10:59:48 -0500 Olaparib provides survival benefits for high-risk BRCA-positive breast cancer patients
FunMap 揭示了癌症相关基因和蛋白质的新见解大规模的蛋白质和基因分析极大地扩展了癌症相关蛋白质和基因突变的范围，但很难辨别它们是在疾病中发挥积极作用还是无辜的旁观者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/FunMap-reveals-new-insights-into-cancer-linked-genes-and- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/FunMap-reveals-new-insights-into-cancer-linked-genes-and- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=737c761c-75d3-46b0-8aac-a140d2ddeccd Wed, 11 Dec 2024 10:54:59 -0500 FunMap reveals new insights into cancer-associated genes and proteins
克利夫兰诊所的研究揭示了肾脏微生物组在肾脏健康中的作用克利夫兰诊所的研究人员找到了影响肾脏健康和肾结石形成的肾脏微生物组的明确证据，证明尿路不是无菌的，低水平的细菌是正常的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Cleveland-Clinic-study-reveals-kidney-microbiomes-role-in-renal-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Cleveland-Clinic-study-reveals-kidney-microbiomes-role-in-renal-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fba2147-c03c-4e91-92f9-3a7f72acaec4 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 10:02:44 -0500 Cleveland Clinic study reveals kidney microbiome's role in renal health
TCR 测序揭示肝细胞癌中的肿瘤免疫相互作用肝细胞癌（HCC）是肝癌的主要形式，是全球癌症相关死亡的第四大原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/TCR-sequencing-sheds-light-on-tumor-immune-interactions-in-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/TCR-sequencing-sheds-light-on-tumor-immune-interactions-in-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67ae50e2-a7c1-4b73-a04f-7093bf2e8f49 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 09:53:17 -0500 TCR sequencing sheds light on tumor immune interactions in hepatocellular carcinoma
Wiley 通过用于 LC-MS 分析、企业数据管理和其他光谱进步的新工具扩展了其 KnowItAll 解决方案最新的 KnowItAll 软件可加速光谱分析，具有自动化 LC-MS 工具和广泛的光谱库，可优化研究工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Wiley-expands-its-KnowItAll-solutions-with-new-tools-for-LC-MS-analysis-enterprise-data-management-and-additional-光谱进展.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Wiley-expands-its-KnowItAll-solutions-with-new-tools-for-LC-MS-analysis-enterprise-data-management-and-additional-光谱-advances.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce4af2d9-c48e-4c9a-be18-29c862d1a60c Wed, 11 Dec 2024 09:53:00 -0500 Wiley expands its KnowItAll solutions with new tools for LC-MS analysis, enterprise data management, and additional spectral advances
探索神经科学药物发现的未来创新的 iPSC 模型正在改变神经科学药物的发现和研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Exploring-the-Future-of-Neuroscience-Drug-Discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Exploring-the-Future-of-Neuroscience-Drug-Discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5143f73c-df17-458a-bf5c-24afc8f21dbf Wed, 11 Dec 2024 09:32:00 -0500 Exploring the Future of Neuroscience Drug Discovery
研究表明体能歧视是残疾人心理健康护理的障碍残疾人 (PWD) 占美国人口的 25%。与非残疾人相比，他们面临着更高的心理健康问题，并且更有可能利用心理健康服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Study-reveals-ableism-as-a-barrier-to-mental-health-care-for-disabled-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Study-reveals-ableism-as-a-barrier-to-mental-health-care-for-disabled-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=334a4e8f-ebff-4dec-909f-4142eb88c4cd Wed, 11 Dec 2024 09:23:00 -0500 Study reveals ableism as a barrier to mental health care for disabled individuals
前列腺癌疫苗：进展、挑战和未来方向前列腺癌疫苗，包括树突状疫苗和肽型疫苗，为改善治疗带来了希望，但在临床有效性和验证方面面临障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Prostate-cancer-vaccines-Progress-challenges-and-future-directions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Prostate-cancer-vaccines-Progress-challenges-and-future-directions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=169bd4a3-f25d-44a3-960c-adfd64be10d7 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 08:59:00 -0500 Prostate cancer vaccines: Progress, challenges, and future directions
高剂量化疗后自体干细胞移植对套细胞淋巴瘤患者无效最新研究表明，对于初次治疗后病情缓解的套细胞淋巴瘤 (MCL) 患者来说，高剂量化疗后进行自体干细胞移植 (ASCT) 没有任何益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/High-dose-chemotherapy-followed-by-autologous-stem-cell-transplant-inefficient-for-病人-with-mantle-cell-lymphoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/High-dose-chemotherapy-followed-by-autologous-stem-cell-transplant-inefficient-for-病人-with-mantle-cell-lymphoma.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb0882fb-551d-47b2-827c-68e7756fb498 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 08:17:54 -0500 High-dose chemotherapy followed by autologous stem cell transplant ineffective for patients with mantle cell lymphoma
